IN THE COURT OF PRESIDING OFFICER ZEESHAN HAIDER RENT CONTROLLER LAHORE
APPLICATION UNDER SECTION 151 FOR SEEKING THE PERMISSION TO BRING ON RECORD FRESH RENT AGREEMENT EXECUTED BETWEEN THE PARTIES AFTER SETTLING THE DISPUTE AMICABLY.

1. That the learned special judge rent, vide its order dated 04.06.2022, pleased to pass the judgement against respondent/judgement-debtor, wherein ejectment was ordered, resultantly the applicant/decree-holder filed the execution petition in this learned court, which is fixed for 20.05.2023, for the report of bailiff.

2. That the learned executing court, issued the warrant of possession of the demised premises. Respondent/judgement-debtor settled the matter amicably with the applicant/decree-holder/landlord and entered in to a fresh rent agreement vide rent deed dated 07.04.2023. The copy of the rent agreement deed is attached herewith.

In the above-mentioned circumstances, it is prayed that the parties have settled their dispute amicably by entering in to fresh rent agreement, the said rent agreement may allow to be placed on record and the execution in hand may please be disposed of.
